Tweets.Text: Michelle and I want the @ObamaFoundation to inspire and empower people to change the world. Here's how we're getting started this fall.
We remember everyone we lost on 9/11 and honor all who defend our country and our ideals. No act of terror will ever change who we are.
Composed tweets will only be saved until the page until a new session is made. Composed tweets are stored in local storage. Any changes will be reset on page refresh.
Our hearts & prayers go out to the people of London, who suffered a vicious terrorist attack...
NEVER forget our HEROES held prisoner or who have gone missing in action while serving their country.
CHAIN MIGRATION cannot be allowed to be part of any legislation on Immigration!
